TopicTitle: Combo data transmit and solar panels

Articles.Content:
So, I have two weird problems. 

First, I can't transmit datas. The datas are send, but never gain science.

![fxi00.png](http://i60.tinypic.com/fxi00.png)

Next, if I can deploy my solar panels, I can't fold them, even manually, there are no option appearing.

![53lklt.png](http://i60.tinypic.com/53lklt.png)

My OS is Windows 7 64 pro.

here my mod list

![2j0yznk.jpg](http://i62.tinypic.com/2j0yznk.jpg)
The solar panels are behaving normally. 1.0 instituted unshielded solar panels as non retractable.
Yeah, shame on me I didn't read that facking manual and those unshielded solar panels can't be folded. About the the science bug It seems it was related to science alert.
